creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
inscription: ULQ: 紅葉題情付御溝當時叮嘱向西流無端東下人間去却使君王不信愁
markings: ULQ： 3 seals:??青; 南宗解?;???図書 ； LRQ, square intaglio：林閬苑印; white round sticker R roller end: [SJ / 50]; bright yellow round sticker R roller end: [E7]
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on silk
title: Lady Inscribing a Banana Leaf in a Garden, after Tang Yin
